needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: Most people consider "bad" writing to be formal speech and technical analysis, as opposed to informal writing, such as essays and stories. This is known as the concept of "good taste" or "style." However, many experts argue that "good" writing is subjective and can vary greatly, not just in terms of power but also in terms of applicability. The concept of "good taste" is based on the idea that most people have strong preferences when it comes to certain types of art, such as art or paintings.
